# panos_commit (Action)





<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `admins` (List of String) List of administrators whose changes to commit (partial commit)
- `description` (String) Commit description
- `device_groups` (List of String) Commit only the specified device groups. Available on Panorama only
- `exclude_device_and_network` (Boolean) Exclude device and network configuration from the commit
- `exclude_policy_and_objects` (Boolean) Exclude policy and objects from the commit. Available on NGFW only
- `exclude_shared_objects` (Boolean) Exclude shared objects from the commit
- `force` (Boolean) Force the commit operation
- `log_collector_groups` (List of String) Commit only the specified log collector groups. Available on Panorama only
- `log_collectors` (List of String) Commit only the specified log collectors. Available on Panorama only
- `push_configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--push_configuration))
- `template_stacks` (List of String) Commit only the specified template stacks. Available on Panorama only
- `templates` (List of String) Commit only the specified templates. Available on Panorama only
- `wildfire_appliances` (List of String) Commit only the specified WildFire appliances. Available on Panorama only
- `wildfire_clusters` (List of String) Commit only the specified WildFire clusters. Available on Panorama only

<a id="nestedatt--push_configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `push_configuration`

Required:

- `name` (String) Name of the target (device group, template, etc.) to push configuration to
- `type` (String) Type of push operation. Valid values: device_group, template, template_stack, log_collector_group, wildfire_appliance, wildfire_cluster

Optional:

- `description` (String) Push operation description. If not specified, defaults to the commit description
- `devices` (List of String) List of device serial numbers to push configuration to. If not specified, pushes to all devices in the target
- `force_template_values` (Boolean) Force template values to override local values on devices. Applicable for device_group, template, and template_stack types
- `include_template` (Boolean) Include template configuration when pushing to a device group. Only applicable when type is device_group
